00000000000100001000000010010011 // addi r1,r1,1; 			r1 = 1, r2 = 0,  r3 = 0
00000000001000001000000010010011 // addi r1,r1,2;			r1 = 3, r2 = 0,  r3 = 0
00000000001100001000000010010011 // addi r1,r1,3; 			r1 = 6, r2 = 0,  r3 = 0
00000000010000001000000100010011 // addi r2,r1,4; 			r1 = 6, r2 = 10, r3 = 0
00000000000000001010000100000011 // lw r2, 0(r1) or r2 <- m32(r1 + 0);  r1 = 6, r2 = 0,  r3 = 0
00000000000100010000000100010011 // addi  r2,r2,1;                      r1 = 6, r2 = 1,  r3 = 0
00000000010000001000000100010011 // addi r2,r1,4; 			r1 = 6, r2 = 10, r3 = 0
00000000000100010010000000100011 // sw r2, imm(r1) or m32(r2+0)<- r1;   r1 = 6, r2 = 10, r3 = 0
00000000000000010010000110000011 // lw r3, 0(r2) or r3 <- m32(r2 + 0);  r1 = 6, r2 = 10, r3 = 6
00000000000100001000000010010011 // addi r1,r1,1;  			r1 = 7, r2 = 10, r3 = 6
00000000000100010010000000100011 // sw r2, imm(r1) or m32(r2+0)<- r1;   r1 = 7, r2 = 10, r3 = 6
00000000000000010010000110000011 // lw r3, 0(r2) or r3 <- m32(r2 + 0);  r1 = 7, r2 = 10, r3 = 7
